sen.j: 宝生九郎(ほうしょう くろう)は、シテ方宝生流宗家が使用する芸名。
sen.e: Kuro HOSHO is a stage name used by the headman of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Hosho school.
Kuro HOSHO is a stage name used by the headman of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Hosho school.
Kuro HOSHO is a stage name used by the headman of the shite-kata (actors who play leading characters in Noh performances) Hosho school.

sen.j: 十六世宝生九郎知栄が有名。
sen.e: Kuro Tomoharu HOSHO the 16th is particularly well known.
